radiate.translation[0].definitions[0].de: if someone radiates a feeling, or if it radiates from them, it is very easy to see that this is how they feel
radiate.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if something radiates light or heat, or if light or heat radiates from something, the light or heat is sent out in all directions
radiate.translation[0].definitions[1].ex: The log fire radiated a warm cosy glow.
Heat radiated from the glowing coals.
radiate.translation[0].definitions[2].de: if things radiate from a central point, they spread out in different directions from that point
radiate.translation[0].definitions[2].ex: There were tiny lines radiating from the corners of her eyes.
